#Project title: Symbiont-mediated metabolic shift in the sea anemone Anthopleura elegantissima
#Project authors: Tyler J. Carrier, Holland Elder, Jason Macrander, James L. Dimond, Brian L. Bingham, & Adam M. Reitzel

#What: Transcriptomic pipeline from raw reads to comparative analysis with Anthopleura in different symbiosis states.
#Type: Transcriptome




###Performed on the command line
###trim raw reads
module load trimmomatic/0.39

java -jar /apps/pkg/trimmomatic/0.39/trimmomatic-0.39.jar /
PE /
-phred33 /
/home/Anthopleura_Transcriptome/raw_files/Aele_transcriptome/AeleB1_R1.fastq.gz /
/home/Anthopleura_Transcriptome/raw_files/Aele_transcriptome/AeleB1_R2.fastq.gz /
/home/Anthopleura_Transcriptome/raw_files/Aele_transcriptome/Trimmed_Files/AeleB1_R1_paired.fastq.gz /
/home/Anthopleura_Transcriptome/raw_files/Aele_transcriptome/Trimmed_Files/AeleB1_R1_unpaired.fastq.gz /
/home/Anthopleura_Transcriptome/raw_files/Aele_transcriptome/Trimmed_Files/AeleB1_R2_paired.fastq.gz /
/home/Anthopleura_Transcriptome/raw_files/Aele_transcriptome/Trimmed_Files/AeleB1_R2_unpaired.fastq.gz /
-trimlog /home/Anthopleura_Transcriptome/raw_files/Aele_transcriptome/Trimmed_Files/trimlog_AeleB1.txt /
ILLUMINACLIP:/apps/pkg/trimmomatic/0.39/adapters/TruSeq3-PE.fa:2:30:10 LEADING:3 TRAILING:3 SLIDINGWINDOW:4:15 MINLEN:36


###convert genome file
module load cufflinks/2.2.1
module load anaconda2/2019.10

gffread /home/Anthopleura_Transcriptome/raw_files/Aele_genome/Aele_GenomeScaffolds_all.gff -T -o /home/Anthopleura_Transcriptome/raw_files/Aele_genome/Aele_GenomeScaffolds_all.gtf


###map to host genome
module load star/2.7.9a

/apps/pkg/star/2.7.9a/bin/STAR /
--runMode genomeGenerate /
--genomeDir /home/Anthopleura_Transcriptome/raw_files/Aele_genome/STAR_genome_index3 /
--genomeFastaFiles /home/Anthopleura_Transcriptome/raw_files/Aele_genome/Aele_GenomeScaffolds.fasta /
--sjdbGTFfile /home/Anthopleura_Transcriptome/raw_files/Aele_genome/Aele_GenomeScaffolds_all.gtf /
--sjdbOverhang 49 /
--genomeSAindexNbases 13 /
--runThreadN 4

/apps/pkg/star/2.7.9a/bin/STAR /
--runMode alignReads /
--readFilesCommand gunzip -c /
--genomeDir /home/Anthopleura_Transcriptome/raw_files/Aele_genome/STAR_genome_index3 /
--outSAMtype BAM SortedByCoordinate /
--quantMode GeneCounts /
--alignSJDBoverhangMin 1 /
--readFilesIn /home/Anthopleura_Transcriptome/raw_files/Aele_transcriptome/trimmed_files/AeleB1_R1_paired.fastq.gz /home/Anthopleura_Transcriptome/raw_files/Aele_transcriptome/trimmed_files/AeleB1_R2_paired.fastq.gz /
--outFileNamePrefix /home/Anthopleura_Transcriptome/raw_files/Aele_transcriptome/map_genome_wSplice2/AeleB1_mapped /
--outReadsUnmapped Fastx


###bam to fastq
module load samtools/1.9

samtools fastq /home/Anthopleura_Transcriptome/raw_files/Aele_transcriptome/map_genome_wSplice/AeleB1_mappedAligned.sortedByCoord.out.bam > /home/Anthopleura_Transcriptome/raw_files/Aele_transcriptome/map_genome_wSplice/AeleB1_mappedAligned.fastq



###Performed using R/RStudio
#clear environment and console
rm(list=ls())

#download library
if (!require("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
  install.packages("BiocManager")
BiocManager::install("DESeq2")

#load library
library(DESeq2)

#set a working directory
setwd("/home/Anthopleura_Transcriptome")

#import data
countdata <- read.table("Aele_mappedReadsPerGene.txt", header = TRUE, row.names = 1)

#convert to matrix
countdata <- as.matrix(countdata)

#assign condition
condition <- factor(c(rep("B",4), rep("G",4), rep("W",4)))
condition = relevel(condition,ref = "W")

#create a coldata frame
coldata <- data.frame(row.names=colnames(countdata), condition)

#make a DESeq dataset
dds <- DESeqDataSetFromMatrix(countData = countdata, colData = coldata, design = ~ condition)

#filter low abundance transcripts
keep <- rowSums(counts(dds)) >= 36
dds <- dds[keep,]

#differential gene expression
dds <- DESeq(dds)

#normalize dataset
rld = rlogTransformation(dds, blind=TRUE)

#plot PCA
ntop <- nrow(rld)

plotPCA(rld, intgroup="condition", ntop=ntop)

pca_data <- plotPCA(rld, intgroup="condition", returnData=TRUE, ntop=ntop)

library(ggplot2)
ggplot(pca_data, aes(x = PC1, y = PC2, color = condition)) +
  geom_point(size = 4) +
  xlab(paste0("PC1: ", round(attr(pca_data, "percentVar")[1] * 100), "% variance")) +
  ylab(paste0("PC2: ", round(attr(pca_data, "percentVar")[2] * 100), "% variance")) +
  theme_bw()

#dendrogram
library(DESeq2)
library(pheatmap)
vsd <- vst(dds, blind = FALSE)
expr_data <- assay(vsd)
dist_matrix <- dist(t(expr_data))
hclust_result <- hclust(dist_matrix, method = "single")
plot(hclust_result, hang = -1, cex = 0.6)

library(ape)
phylo_tree <- as.phylo(hclust_result)
write.tree(phylo_tree, file = "your_tree.nwk")

#statistics for PCA 
pca_result <- prcomp(t(assay(rld)), scale. = TRUE)

library(vegan)
metadata <- as.data.frame(colData(dds))
colnames(metadata)
head(metadata)
anosim_result <- anosim(vegdist(pca_result$x, method = "euclidean"), metadata$condition)
print(anosim_result)

#subset differentially expressed genes
res <- results(dds)
table(res$padj<0.05)
res <- res[order(res$padj), ]
resdata <- merge(as.data.frame(res), as.data.frame(counts(dds, normalized=TRUE)), by="row.names", sort=FALSE)
names(resdata)[1] <- "Gene"
sig_genes <- subset(resdata, padj < 0.05)
write.csv(sig_genes, file="diffexpr-results.csv",quote = FALSE,row.names = F)
#This was exported for Blast2GO, for annotation and pair-wise comparison

#heatmap
library(pheatmap)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplotify)
library(heatmaply)

mat<-read.csv("diffexpr-results.csv",header=TRUE,row.names=1,
              check.names=FALSE)

pheatmap(mat,scale="row",
         show_rownames = FALSE,
         show_colnames = TRUE,
         cluster_rows = TRUE,
         cluster_cols = TRUE,
         color = colorRampPalette(c("navy", "white", "firebrick3"))(50))

#Scatter plot of relative DEG
library(ggplot2)

scatterdata <- read.table("Aele_DiffExpXY.txt", header = TRUE, row.names = 1)
AeleB_RelExp <- scatterdata$AeleB
AeleG_RelExp <- scatterdata$AeleG

scatterdata <- data.frame(AeleB_RelExp, AeleG_RelExp)

ggplot(scatterdata, aes(x = AeleB_RelExp, y = AeleG_RelExp)) +
  geom_point(size = 1.5) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = c(0, 15, -15), color = c('black', 'gray', 'gray')) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = c(0, 15, -15), color = c('black', 'gray', 'gray')) +
  xlim(c(-13, 10)) +
  ylim(c(-13, 10)) +
  theme_minimal()

#annotation of DEGs were performed with Blast2GO. These GO numbers were were then imported into Revigo with the cooresponding loci from the Aele genome and which quadrant that it orginated from the XY scatter of DEGs. 

#plotting revigo for aposymbiotic (-, - quadrant) vs symbiotic (the three others)
library( ggplot2 );
library( scales );
library(svglite);

revigo.names <- c("term_ID","description","frequency","plot_X","plot_Y","log_size","value","uniqueness","dispensability");
revigo.data <- rbind(c("GO:0000028","ribosomal small subunit assembly",0.18744841915016353,1.7464640643783518,6.813633531050416,4.881116349983343,2,0.8689641072624218,0.86140751),

                     c("GO:1902476","chloride transmembrane transport",0.3005824575372099,-4.247947584514633,4.226825307011943,5.08619604941759,1,0.8956533650158267,0),

                     c("GO:1904108","protein localization to ciliary inversin compartment",0.021021768880920222,-2.6687953584207333,5.8300175542415715,3.930949031167523,2,0.8972078780279247,0.41628389),
                     c("GO:1990180","mitochondrial tRNA 3'-end processing",0.003002053522917203,3.3522235953304937,2.4145107637706964,3.0860037056183818,1,0.842554468109093,0.37601678),
                     c("GO:2000640","positive regulation of SREBP signaling pathway",0.0034826778554039478,-2.420941869633907,-6.416255277264925,3.150449409460881,2,0.9242081287176717,0.52779091));

one.data <- data.frame(revigo.data);
names(one.data) <- revigo.names;
one.data <- one.data [(one.data$plot_X != "null" & one.data$plot_Y != "null"), ];
one.data$plot_X <- as.numeric( as.character(one.data$plot_X) );
one.data$plot_Y <- as.numeric( as.character(one.data$plot_Y) );
one.data$log_size <- as.numeric( as.character(one.data$log_size) );
one.data$value <- as.numeric( as.character(one.data$value) );
one.data$frequency <- as.numeric( as.character(one.data$frequency) );
one.data$uniqueness <- as.numeric( as.character(one.data$uniqueness) );
one.data$dispensability <- as.numeric( as.character(one.data$dispensability) );

p1 <- ggplot( data = one.data );
p1 <- p1 + geom_point( aes(plot_X, plot_Y, colour = value, size = frequency), alpha = I(1.0) );
p1 <- p1 + scale_x_continuous(name ="semantic space x", breaks = seq(-8, 8, by = 4), limits=c(-8, 8))
p1 <- p1 + scale_y_continuous(name ="semantic space y", breaks = seq(-8, 8, by = 4), limits=c(-8, 8))
ex <- one.data [ one.data$dispensability < 0.15, ];
p1 <- p1 + labs (y = "semantic space x", x = "semantic space y");
p1 <- p1 + theme(legend.key = element_blank()) ;

p1;

ggsave(file="/Users/tcarrie1/Desktop/Anthopleura_SymbiosisStates/Transcriptome/Aele_GO_Revigo_Scatter.svg", width=5, height=5);


#plotting revigo for symbiont-specific GO (i.e., both, green, and brown)
library( ggplot2 );
library( scales );

revigo.names <- c("term_ID","description","frequency","plot_X","plot_Y","log_size","value","uniqueness","dispensability");
revigo.data <- rbind(c("GO:0000028","ribosomal small subunit assembly",0.18744841915016353,-2.1475989580791826,5.339159113424742,4.881116349983343,2,0.8673745938460657,0.84321118),
                     c("GO:0000045","autophagosome assembly",0.17256138854390743,-3.2266297659350878,4.640884221600124,4.845178687215316,2,0.7980320452920568,0.73230369),
                     c("GO:0000055","ribosomal large subunit export from nucleus",0.042115015226671805,0.45915540007166694,5.192313160012855,4.2326912353484625,2,0.8271812854451613,0.74570033),
                     c("GO:0000122","negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II",0.552067290955774,2.5285216819932446,-4.2605390439991355,5.350222813012284,4,0.856761626271724,0.8776149),
                     c("GO:0000132","establishment of mitotic spindle orientation",0.05026098147728047,0.273062951250541,5.397622731101321,4.3094811192361036,4,0.8040944178721184,0.65789399),
                     c("GO:0000184","nuclear-transcribed mRNA catabolic process, nonsense-mediated decay",0.09635901681317575,-1.7741590613394254,-2.647693336830685,4.592132326020115,2,0.6936560290422602,0.72114512),
                     c("GO:0000209","protein polyubiquitination",0.44079166665434294,-7.2761420688685865,-1.7914792206974013,5.252464661195994,2,0.8471219367809114,0.85192051),
                     c("GO:0000226","microtubule cytoskeleton organization",0.9397413422797487,-1.9127055258708128,6.024208452222696,5.581238329747849,2,0.8548207054282033,0.85548638),
                     c("GO:0000278","mitotic cell cycle",1.1727085828266566,4.548981416722847,1.5440513146248285,5.677419873842863,2,0.976697512258593,0.01177857),

                     c("GO:0072488","ammonium transmembrane transport",0.06361494369991216,4.050378347355516,4.309714090246894,4.411804830815424,2,0.9181282156510067,0.52986053),
                     c("GO:0098609","cell-cell adhesion",0.5669838984440292,6.456458647900502,2.344948125755874,5.361801471013038,2,0.9682204468502379,0.73257507),
                     c("GO:1902275","regulation of chromatin organization",0.02889414897303643,4.559854911194918,-3.7785867663336457,4.069075809766398,2,0.927061622712887,0.460283),
                     c("GO:1904108","protein localization to ciliary inversin compartment",0.021021768880920222,2.238467197488127,5.834727880752605,3.930949031167523,3,0.9070922233959671,0.19053835),
                     c("GO:2000640","positive regulation of SREBP signaling pathway",0.0034826778554039478,4.478000290440899,-5.624263161266887,3.150449409460881,2,0.9131375234809042,0.52779091));

one.data <- data.frame(revigo.data);
names(one.data) <- revigo.names;
one.data <- one.data [(one.data$plot_X != "null" & one.data$plot_Y != "null"), ];
one.data$plot_X <- as.numeric( as.character(one.data$plot_X) );
one.data$plot_Y <- as.numeric( as.character(one.data$plot_Y) );
one.data$log_size <- as.numeric( as.character(one.data$log_size) );
one.data$value <- as.numeric( as.character(one.data$value) );
one.data$frequency <- as.numeric( as.character(one.data$frequency) );
one.data$uniqueness <- as.numeric( as.character(one.data$uniqueness) );
one.data$dispensability <- as.numeric( as.character(one.data$dispensability) );

p1 <- ggplot( data = one.data );
p1 <- p1 + geom_point( aes(plot_X, plot_Y, colour = value, size = frequency), alpha = I(1.0) );
p1 <- p1 + scale_x_continuous(name ="semantic space x", breaks = seq(-9, 9, by = 3), limits=c(-9, 9))
p1 <- p1 + scale_y_continuous(name ="semantic space y", breaks = seq(-9, 9, by = 3), limits=c(-9, 9))
ex <- one.data [ one.data$dispensability < 0.15, ];
p1 <- p1 + labs (y = "semantic space x", x = "semantic space y");
p1 <- p1 + theme(legend.key = element_blank()) ;

p1;

ggsave(file="/Users/tcarrie1/Desktop/Anthopleura_SymbiosisStates/Transcriptome/Aele_GO_Revigo_Scatter_symbiosis.svg", width=5, height=5)
